name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; After a few rough days of walking,{w} Emma and the group start to slow down and talk of setting up camp on Mt. Blanca.{w} The mountain winds howl as though calling out to the wolves that stalk the nearby fortresses,{w} once used to defend the mountain in times of war.;;;hint
speak;Caroline; Emily, I swear if you ask one more time, I'll throw you off the mountain.
speak;Emily; Jeez, it's not that serious{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Do you think it's worth making camp for the night?{w} The sun is already starting to set.
speak;Caroline; We're not that far, but{tgm}...
speak;Emily; My legs are going to fall off if I don't get a rest.
speak;Caroline; Fine, fine. Let's put up the tents again.
speak;Emma; Man, I'm glad Emily said something,{w} because all this walking is killing my feet, too.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Caroline; ALRIGHT EVERYONE, WE'RE SETTING UP CAMP HERE!{w} BRING THE TORCHES AND TENTS OUT!
speak;Emma; Man, I'm pretty exhausted...{w} I should see what everyone else is up to.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
for;TALK_TARGET;[x.nid for x in game.get_player_units() if x.nid != 'Emma']
